text: jo tame loko phensalo icchata hoya to te phensalo tamari same ja che, ane jo alaga raho to a tamara mate uttama che, ane jo tame phari te ja karya karaso to ame pana phari te ja karisum ane tamari ekata tamane kami pana phayado nahim pahoncade, bhalene ketaliya prabala hoya ane kharekhara vata evi che ke allaha ta'ala imanavala'oni sathe che
